DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to study the pathways through which short sleep duration or poor sleep quality can lead to an increased risk of developing diabetes and obesity.
DOC.brief_title: Pathways Linking Reduced Sleep Duration and Quality to Obesity Risk
DOC.criteria: Normal weight Healthy Normal sleep times Sleep disorders Overweight Diabetes Other health conditions Excessive caffeine and alcohol intake Smoking
DOC.keyword: obesity, diabetes risk related to sleep
